dialogues.speaker: Amy
dialogues.text: Hey Mark, I heard you went on a vacation. How was it?

dialogues.speaker: Mark
dialogues.text: Yeah, I just got back from a trip to Hawaii. It was amazing!

dialogues.speaker: Amy
dialogues.text: That sounds fantastic! What were some of the highlights?

dialogues.speaker: Mark
dialogues.text: Well, I went snorkeling and saw some incredible marine life. I also hiked to the top of a volcano and watched the sunrise.

dialogues.speaker: Amy
dialogues.text: Wow, that must have been breathtaking! Did you try any local cuisine?

dialogues.speaker: Mark
dialogues.text: Definitely! I tried traditional Hawaiian dishes like poi, kalua pig, and haupia. They were delicious!

dialogues.speaker: Amy
dialogues.text: I'm so jealous! I need to plan a trip there soon.
